channel.title: Unlock all alternate recipes mod
channel.description: Even when reloading before i added this mod and deleting it, there is no way to remove the change of it unlocking everytthing on the load of the game, i tried this mod just to see what the recipes were, and how easy they would be to adjust my factory to, removed it, but the changes are still there.

item.title: Unlock all alternate recipes mod
item.dc:creator: @RipDaPip Rip Da Pip
item.description:
@RipDaPip wrote:

Even when reloading before i added this mod and deleting it, there is no way to remove the change of it unlocking everytthing on the load of the game, i tried this mod just to see what the recipes were, and how easy they would be to adjust my factory to, removed it, but the changes are still there.

Read full topic
